price: 45. Y no pudieron siquiera levantarse (para escapar) y no se salvaron del castigo.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
